sentences.en: She found it necessary to reassert her position.
sentences.cn: 她觉得有必要重申她的立场。

sentences.en: His sense of humour was beginning to reassert itself.
sentences.cn: 他的幽默感又开始显现了。

sentences.en: Europe was poised to reassert its traditional preeminence in Western art.
sentences.cn: 欧洲准备重新确立其在西方艺术上的传统卓越地位。
